changeSet.author: Krzysztof Kwiatkowski
changeSet.sql: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW vw_loan AS SELECT l.id, l.householdDTO, l.amount, l.annual_loan_percentage, l.bank, l.start_date, l.end_date, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, l.start_date, l.end_date) AS full_installment_duration, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, CURDATE(), l.end_date) AS installment_duration_to_go, l.installment_amount FROM loanDTO l;
